subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ricardo Santos shot a nine-under-par 63 to win the Madeira Islands Open by four strokes, becoming the first Portuguese-born golfer to win on the European Tour in his home country.
snippet: Ricardo Santos shot a nine-under-par 63 to win the Madeira Islands Open by four strokes, becoming the first Portuguese-born golfer to win on the European Tour in his home country.
